preconditions.precondition: User is authenticated and has necessary permissions.

mainSequence.step: User sends a POST request to Spider to create a driver with specified details.
Spider creates the driver and updates the Spider database with the driver information.
Spider sends the driver information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Spider to create a region with specified details.
Spider creates the region and updates the Spider database with the region information.
Spider sends the region information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Spider to create a credential with specified details.
Spider creates the credential and updates the Spider database with the credential information.
Spider sends the credential information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Spider to create a connection configuration with specified details.
Spider creates the connection configuration and updates the Spider database with the configuration information.
Spider sends the configuration information back to the User.
User sends a POST request to Tumblebug to create a namespace with specified name.
Tumblebug creates the namespace and updates the Tumblebug database with the namespace information.
Tumblebug sends the namespace information back to the User.
